name: Zion National Park
description: Explore stunning red rock canyons, hike famous trails like Angel’s Landing, and enjoy breathtaking scenery.

name: Arches National Park
description: Marvel at over 2,000 natural stone arches, including Delicate Arch and Landscape Arch.

name: Bryce Canyon National Park
description: Walk among hoodoos—tall, thin rock spires—and experience one of the most unique landscapes in the world.

name: Salt Lake City & Temple Square
description: Visit the heart of Utah’s capital, featuring the Salt Lake Temple, gardens, and historical buildings.

name: Park City & Deer Valley
description: Ski world-class slopes, explore charming downtown Park City, or enjoy summer outdoor activities.
cost: Varies (Ski passes start at $100+ per day)

name: Monument Valley
description: See the iconic red sandstone formations featured in countless films and enjoy Navajo-guided tours.

name: Great Salt Lake
description: Experience the largest saltwater lake in the Western Hemisphere, with unique floating and bird-watching opportunities.

name: Capitol Reef National Park
description: Explore a hidden gem filled with cliffs, canyons, and historic orchards.
